channel.title: Adding an item to a client
channel.description:
I haven't really worked with clients that much, But I was wondering which class I would edit to add items..
The only reason I ask this is because I do not yet have fire capes added to my current client which causes any player to lagg out..
thanks, LkcTheReturn
